sentence.Network_en: Thousands of years ago in Egypt, salt was used to embalm the dead.
sentence.Network_cn: 千万年前埃及人曾利用盐涂尸防腐.

sentence.Network_en: The Egyptians used to embalm the bodies of their deadkings and queens.
sentence.Network_cn: 埃及人以前用药物保存国王和王后的尸体.

sentence.Network_en: The Egyptians used to embalm the bodies of their dead kings.
sentence.Network_cn: 埃及人以前用药物保存国王的尸体.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French embaumer, from em- 'in' + baume 'balm', variant of basme (see balm)

entry.def: If a dead person is embalmed, their body is preserved using special substances.

example.tran: 他的尸体进行了防腐处理。
经过防腐处理的列宁遗体

auth_sentence.content: We have decided to prepare the body of our commander President, to embalm it, so that his people will always have him.
auth_sentence.res_content: We have decided to prepare the body of our commander President, to embalm it, so that his people will always have him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We have decided to prepare the body of our commander President, to embalm it, so that his people will always have him.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 动词前缀,通常加在名词前构成动词,表示"进入……之中,包围,成为"; 2. 动词前缀,表示"使……进入状态或加强等意思"

stems_affixes.word_buile: em使……进入状态或加强等意思+pyre火+al……的→进入火,太阳的→天空的
em进入……之中,包围,成为+path感情+y→进入感情
em进入……之中,包围,成为+balm香油→古人用香油保存尸体,引申为"铭记"
em进入+barr栏+ass表动词→被栏住→使难堪
em进入……之中,包围,成为+battle战斗→v.整军备战
em进入……之中,包围,成为+bed范围;床→进入范围→安置
em进入……之中,包围,成为+bezzle毁坏→毁坏[公家的钱]→贪污

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使陷入泥沼, 使不能动弹
stems_affixes.word_buile: em进入……之中,包围,成为+bog泥→v.使陷入泥沼, 使不能动弹
em进入……之中,包围,成为+brace胳膊→进入怀抱
em使……进入状态或加强等意思+bell美好+ish表动词→进入美好→装饰
em使……进入状态或加强等意思+bitter痛苦的→v.使痛苦
em使……进入状态或加强等意思+body身体→[精神]进入身体→体现
em使……进入状态或加强等意思+boss凸出→使凸出
em使……进入状态或加强等意思+brown褐色→v.着褐色, 使成淡黑
em使……进入状态或加强等意思+power权力→v.授权
balm香油+y……的→adj.[气候]温和的,芳香的
em进入+balm香料→古人用香油保存尸体,引申为"铭记"
